Queries.UpdateAllInformationById: UPDATE crudoperation.crudapplicationtable SET UserName=@UserName, EmailId=@EmailId, PhoneNumber=@PhoneNumber, Salary=@Salary, Gendar=@Gender WHERE UserId = @UserId
Queries.DeleteInformationById: UPDATE crudoperation.crudapplicationtable SET IsActive = 0 WHERE UserId = @UserId
Queries.ReadInformationById: SELECT * FROM crudoperation.crudapplicationtable WHERE UserId=@UserId AND IsActive = 1
Queries.UpdateOnceInformationById: UPDATE crudoperation.crudapplicationtable SET Salary = @Salary WHERE UserId = @UserId
